type.description: Puppet manifest file applied on the host.

generate-deployable.description: Puppet manifest file applied on the host.

type.description: Puppet manifest folder applied on the host.

generate-deployable.description: Puppet manifest folder applied on the host.

property.name: manifestFile
property.description: Manifest file name. For example, init.pp.

property.name: manifestPath
property.description: Location of the manifest folder as an absolute path or as a path relative to the uploaded folder artifact.

property.name: modulePath
property.description: Location of the module directory as an absolute path or as a path relative to the uploaded folder artifact.

property.name: hieraConfig
property.description: Location of the Hiera configuration file as an absolute path or as a path relative to the uploaded folder artifact.

type.description: Puppet module installed from Puppet Forge. The artifact name should be same as the Puppet module name. For example, puppetlabs-apache.

generate-deployable.description: Puppet module installed from Puppet Forge. The artifact name should be same as the Puppet module name. For example, puppetlabs-apache.

property.name: version
property.description: Version of the module to install from Puppet Forge.

property.name: force
property.description: Force overwrite of existing module, if any. Implies --force.

property.name: ignoreDependencies
property.description: Do not attempt to install dependencies. Implied by --ignore-dependencies.

type.description: Puppet module installed from a tarball archive file. The artifact name should be same as the Puppet module name. For example, puppetlabs-apache.

generate-deployable.description: Puppet module installed from a tarball archive file. The artifact name should be same as the Puppet module name. For example, puppetlabs-apache.
